meanings.definition: The boundary of a circle or other closed curve.
meanings.sent1: The circumference of the circle was clearly marked with a red line.
meanings.sent2: She measured the circumference of the tire to check if it would fit her bike.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran around the circumference of the garden, teasing the dog.
meanings.sent4: The circumference of his influence extended far beyond the borders of the city.
meanings.sent5: The circumference of the moon in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The length of a line that forms a circle or other closed curve.
meanings.sent1: The circumference of the rope was just long enough to reach the top of the tree.
meanings.sent2: He calculated the circumference of the track to determine how many laps he needed to run.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled an endless string from his hat, its circumference growing with each pull.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him seemed to wrap around her heart like the circumference of a circle.
meanings.sent5: The circumference of the snake's coil was mesmerizing as it slithered through the grass.
